[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Election/ElectionContractState.cs] [State: MinimumLockTime, MaximumLockTime] [Lock Time Inversion] Can MaximumLockTime be set to less than MinimumLockTime, creating an impossible voting condition where no valid lock periods exist, causing DoS of all voting? (Medium)
